info.name: Chroma
info.summary: Welcome to Chroma 2.0, featuring a complete code rework that prioritizes performance to bring y...
info.description:
Welcome to Chroma 2.0, featuring a complete code rework that prioritizes performance to bring you amazing features like the RGB lights that you all know and love and a rainbow lights mode.

This mod was imported from BeatMods, and was originally uploaded by Aeroluna at 2020-07-30T06:04:49.733Z.
